header_text: Recently, you've just wanted to spend time alone and don't have much motivation to get out of bed. You ordered delivery a few nights in a row, and spent much more money on takeout than you normally do. You realize that there are some easy meals you can handle making next week and start planning.

elements.Text: Are you going to spend all of your money on delivery?
